tool_description: This API endpoint allows you to convert a given string into its SHA-256 hash representation. The server takes the input string from the request body, processes it, and responds with the SHA-256 hash as a JSON object.  To use this API, send a POST request to the /convert endpoint with a JSON body containing the "string" field with the string you want to convert. The response will contain the SHA-256 hash of the input string.  SHA-256 (Secure Hash Algorithm 256-bit) is a widely used cryptograph...
name: String to SHA-256 Converter
title: String to SHA-256 Converter

api_list.name: getString
